description: Retrieves the patch baseline that should be used for the specified patch group.

parameters.name: PatchGroup
parameters.description: The name of the patch group whose patch baseline should be retrieved.

nested_items.name: BaselineId
nested_items.description: The ID of the patch baseline that should be used for the patch group.

nested_items.name: PatchGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the patch group.

nested_items.name: OperatingSystem
nested_items.description: The operating system rule specified for patch groups using the patch baseline.
